action: Reduce number of adults with developmental disabilities in insittutional settings
action_description: Reduce the number of adults diagnosed as having a developmental disability residing in institutional settings by 70% from 2025 levels
data_definition: Number of adults diagnosed with a developmental disability who spent at least 10 days in an institutional facility at least once in the calendar year

action: Increase number of community mental health facilities
action_description: Add net 10 new community mental health beds each year
data_definition: Net change in community mental health beds in New York State as at December 1 compared to previous calendar year

action: Improve employability of Access-VR program
action_description: Increase the proportion of Access-VR participants who are in Competitive Integrated Employment in the 2nd quarter after  completing the program
